co.nayt.picnic

Interface TaskRunnable.TaskRunnableDownloadMethods

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Task
    Enclosing class:
    TaskRunnable

    static interface TaskRunnable.TaskRunnableDownloadMethods
    An interface that defines methods that Task implements. An instance of Task passes itself to a TaskRunnable instance through the TaskRunnable constructor, after which the two instances can access each other's variables.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Clears the cache.

      Returns the current contents of the decoded Bitmap

      Returns the desired height of the image, based on the ImageView being created.

      Returns the desired width of the image, based on the ImageView being created.

      Defines the actions for each state of the Task instance.
